msbt.message: Well, , you're the guest of honor today, so press  to blow out your candles!
Go on, darling! Press  and blow out your candles! You're the guest of honor! Everyone is waiting on you!
My goodness, there's something about seeing candles on a cake! It just lights me up! But go on, , today is your day! Press  and blow out those beautiful candles!
Time keeps marching on and there's nothing to be done about it, is there, my dear?But, you know, I don't like to think I'm getting older. I like to think I'm getting better!
Today, , you're one year olderand one step closer to adulthood! Oh, don't worry, sweetie. You wear your years extremely well!

I just LOVE a good birthday party, don't you? I don't even mind when the party isn't for me! Yes, today is all about you, my dear! It marks the start of another year. Let's be sure to make it a good one!
Oh, ! I do hope the next year is a fabulous one for you! I'll be cheering you on from the sidelines, !
What a fabulous birthday party! I'm so glad I got to spend your special day with you!

Did you know that we have the same birthday?<10_4 /> We do! We DO! What a marvelous birthday surprise! Well, a very happy birthday to the both of us!Oooh! I wonder if folks will think we're twins?! Hahaha!

Would you believe it?! Today is MY birthday too! What a wonderful coincidence, don't you think? There are 365 days in a year, so what are the odds that we'd be born on the same day?Hmmm Ummm If you divide by You know, let's forget the math for now and just enjoy the party!
My goodness! You have a birthday on New Year's Day!You do know how to start the year right...with not one, but TWO parties! Happy New Year, indeed!

Oooh, your birthday is February 29th?! So you're a leap baby, then!A birthday that comes but once every four years somehow feels especially special. When the next leap day finally arrives, I want to be the first in line to wish you a happy birthday!
Your birthday comes only once every four yearsbut at long last, the day is here! I say we celebrate four times as much! After all, we have a lot of catching up to do.
I JUST noticed that the number of your birthday month matches the number of your birthday day! has a marvelous ring to it, don't you think?I don't mind telling you, I envy your unique birth date.
It must be nice having a birthday during such a festive time of year.Everyone is in such a celebratory mood, darling!I hope all that happiness and good cheer makes your special day even more special.
What a wonderful day to have a birthday, my dear.It's as if everyone is filled with just a bit more happiness and joy. Which is so very YOU, I think.
I warn you, that piñata is extremely well made. I should know. I helped with its construction, !
Come now, that piñata is waiting! There's no need to hold back. Give it some gusto, !
No matter how old you are, breaking a piñata is always a thrill. Now, don't be shy—go get it!
